featuredVideo.title: Broadsign Connect

videos.title: Modernizing the Platform that Powers OOH

speakers.name: Francois Hechme, VP of Products, Broadsign
Gavin Lee, Senior Director of Product, Broadsign

videos.description: Discover our key focus areas for 2024. Watch as Francois & Gavin provide the latest updates to our platform evolution, our trading capabilities, and our plans for AI.

speakers.name: Daan Krijnen, Head of Innovations, Ocean Outdoor
Pascal Arntz, Revenue Manager, Ocean Outdoor

videos.title: The Future of Static Out-of-Home

speakers.name: Catherine Lee, Product Marketing Specialist, Broadsign

videos.description: In this session, our product marketing specialist, Catherine Lee, shares the latest insights from our brand-new State of Static Out-of-Home report.

videos.title: Panel: Revenue Growth through Automation

videos.description: We invited three OOH industry veterans to share their insights and perspectives on how automation for direct selling can help media owners improve their bottom lines.
